scenic_route.rationale: When rapport drifts into tangents, a clear framework brings structure and control back to the conversation.

business_blitzer.rationale: When you rush into business, cultural connection and shared context builds the trust foundation you skipped.

generous_professor.rationale: When you teach too much, focus on diagnosing and articulating their specific problem instead.

advice_avalanche.rationale: When you give away solutions, use questions to help the buyer discover their own truth instead.

surface_scanner.rationale: When discovery stays shallow, dig deeper to articulate the real problem and its impact.

agenda_abandoner.rationale: When you lose the agenda, a clear framework creates structure and keeps the call on track.

passenger.rationale: When the buyer leads and you follow, a clear framework establishes your authority and control.

premature_solution.rationale: When you jump to solutions too early, help the buyer discover their own needs through questions first.

soft_close_fade.rationale: When the close loses energy, reflect the buyer's own desires and stakes back to them clearly.

over_explain_loop.rationale: When you over-explain, create safety and reduce pressure instead of adding more words.
